attributes.action: Stricter control on all racial crimes by imposing harsh fines and restrictions.
attributes.additional_details:
It is our goverments responsibility to ensure that all of its citizens, regardless of the colour of their skin, grow up and live in a society where they are not discriminated against.

We are far too developed to be experiencing these issues. Our leaders consistently tell us they are against this kind of behaviour and I believe its time for them to put their money where their mouths are by putting in stricter controls on rasism and ending it once and for all!
attributes.background: It has become clear after the England football game that racial abuse in the UK is out of control. A developed country like the UK should not be experiencing embarrassing racial incidents like this.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase penalties for racist and religious hate crimes: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592025

Require lifetime Football Banning Orders for racist football offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591817

If you want particular restrictions to be imposed on people found guilty of offences related to racism, we may be able to accept a petition about this, but it would need to be clear what restrictions you want to be imposed.
